title: Design Observer Font - Proxima Nova?
content:
Hey folks, I have been under the assumption that Design Observer was Proxima Nova Bold, Mark's wonderful Geo/humanist Sans. But after trying to roughly match it with the Myfonts tester, I realized that it is closer to Avenir (my new favorite) in every letter except the the "S" and the "R." Does anyone know what is being used?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417102459im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DesObs_5842.gif)

TiA,  
Mike
author: lunyboy

comments.content: Thanks Gents, I wasn't even thinking about H&F-J, it is oddly appropriate for that type of blog though.
